function.name: GetString
function.desc: Returns the value associated with this ConVar as string. If the ConVar doesn't exist, an empty string will be returned.

function.name: GetInt
function.desc: Returns the value associated with this ConVar as string. If the ConVar doesn't exist, 0 will be returned.

function.name: GetFloat
function.desc: Returns the value associated with this ConVar as string. If the ConVar doesn't exist, 0 will be returned.

function.name: GetBool
function.desc: Returns the value associated with this ConVar as string. If the ConVar doesn't exist, false will be returned.

function.name: GetFlags
function.desc: Returns the flags associated with this ConVar.

function.name: GetDefault
function.desc: Returns the default value for this ConVar.

function.name: GetHelpText
function.desc: Returns the help text for this ConVar.

function.name: GetName
function.desc: Returns the name of this ConVar.

function.name: AddChangeCallback
function.desc: Creates a function callback for this ConVar, which will be called whenever the ConVar changes.
